仁丹.definition: Jintan mouth refresher lozenge, produced by Morishita Jintan company from 1905

仁人君子.definition: people of good will (idiom); charitable person

仁人志士.definition: gentleman aspiring to benevolence (idiom); people with lofty ideals

仁人義士.definition: those with lofty ideals (idiom); men of vision

仁化.definition: see 仁化縣|仁化县[Ren2 hua4 Xian4]

仁化縣.definition: Renhua County, Shaoguan 韶關|韶关[Shao2 guan1], Guangdong

仁和.definition: Renhe district of Panzhihua city 攀枝花市[Pan1 zhi1 hua1 shi4], south Sichuan

仁和區.definition: Renhe district of Panzhihua city 攀枝花市[Pan1 zhi1 hua1 shi4], south Sichuan

仁壽.definition: Renshou County in Meishan 眉山市[Mei2 shan1 Shi4], Sichuan

仁壽縣.definition: Renshou County in Meishan 眉山市[Mei2 shan1 Shi4], Sichuan

仁川.definition: Incheon Metropolitan City in Gyeonggi Province 京畿道[Jing1 ji1 dao4], South Korea

仁川市.definition: Incheon Metropolitan City in Gyeonggi Province 京畿道[Jing1 ji1 dao4], South Korea

仁川廣域市.definition: Incheon Metropolitan City in Gyeonggi Province 京畿道[Jing1 ji1 dao4], South Korea

仁布.definition: Rinbung county, Tibetan: Rin spungs rdzong, in Shigatse prefecture, Tibet

仁布縣.definition: Rinbung county, Tibetan: Rin spungs rdzong, in Shigatse prefecture, Tibet

仁弟.definition: (honorific written address to younger man) My dear young friend

仁心仁術.definition: benevolent heart and skillful execution (idiom, from Mencius); charitable in thought and deed

仁愛區.definition: Ren'ai or Jenai District of Keelung City 基隆市[Ji1 long2 Shi4], Taiwan

仁愛鄉.definition: Ren'ai or Jenai Township in Nantou County 南投縣|南投县[Nan2 tou2 Xian4], central Taiwan

仁慈.definition: benevolent; charitable; kind; kindly; kindness; merciful

仁懷.definition: Renhuai, county-level city in Zunyi 遵義|遵义[Zun1 yi4], Guizhou

仁懷市.definition: Renhuai, county-level city in Zunyi 遵義|遵义[Zun1 yi4], Guizhou

仁民愛物.definition: love to all creatures (idiom, from Mencius); universal benevolence

仁義道德.definition: compassion, duty, propriety and integrity (idiom); all the traditional virtues; mainly used sarcastically, to mean hypocritical

仁者見仁，智者見智.pinyin: rén zhě jiàn rén ， zhì zhě jiàn zhì
仁者見仁，智者見智.definition: The benevolent sees benevolence, the wise sees wisdom.; Different views are admissible. (idiom)

仁至義盡.definition: extreme benevolence, utmost duty (idiom); meticulous virtue and attention to duty

仁術.definition: kindness; benevolence; to govern in humanitarian way

仁言利博.definition: Words of benevolence apply universally (idiom). Humanitarian expressions benefit all.
